nodes.text: Sandara Li was a female individual who served as a lieutenant in the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War. She fought against the Galactic Empire in the Battle for Kuat Drive Yards and the Battle of Jakku as a pilot in her X-wing, in which she was assigned escort duty for Blade Squadron, a group of B-wing starfighters.
Sandara Li first appeared in the short story Blade Squadron: Kuat, a short story that appeared in the 168th issue of Star Wars Insider.
